website_summaries.verdict: Cheeky dog tail, perfect for hanging leashes.
pros: Easy to hang – the keyhole on the back slips over a nail or screw (not included)
Colorful and pliable rubber, so works well in a kid’s room

customer_reviews.title: I had a black one before but like lime green so I got this one
customer_reviews.text: I had a black one before but like lime green so I got this one. It's as expected. I don't think it came with a screw but the screw from my last one was still there. Kind of wish I'd gotten black because my dog's butt isn't lime green! My last one held up for years...I hang a flexi leash, harness and umbrella on it.
customer_reviews.author: MadMom2

customer_reviews.title: My dogs leash looks perfect on this
customer_reviews.text: My doggie daycare has a couple of these on the wall with leashes hanging and I always admired them- finally I asked where they got them and the same day, mine were on the way to me! My dog's leash hangs proudly on it by the door and I love it. It's adorable and I have already gotten a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather C

customer_reviews.title: This hook is where I hang my bathroom pass at ...
customer_reviews.text: This hook is where I hang my bathroom pass at school, and it cracks my high school students up.
customer_reviews.author: ap

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute! I just wish they came with a drywalanchor and screw. It was hard for me to find a screw that fit.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Richard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered, to go with others I already had in green.
customer_reviews.author: hm

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: very cute and perfect to hang dog stuff on. put up in 2 minutes
customer_reviews.author: just me

customer_reviews.title: Its a good hook, mine was dirty when i got it
customer_reviews.text: Its a good hook , mine was dirty when i got it. Its for the garage so its not a big deal but i would not buy another.
customer_reviews.author: P..C

customer_reviews.title: ... very upset when I opened it and seen how dirty it was
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about this wall hook and though it will still be functional I was very upset when I opened it and seen how dirty it was. There was black marks all over the entire hook. I made sure it would wipe clean, which it should. However, for a new item, I was hoping for a better condition upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Reba

customer_reviews.title: NOT new; piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: I was sent the right item...but it was scuffed up with black marks all over it and VERY much looked like it had been used previously. Buyer beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: jlg

customer_reviews.title: nice color. Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Lovely hook, very resistant, nice color. Very easy to install, just a nail in the wall. Amazing for dog lovers!!
customer_reviews.author: Mariano Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Very unusual conversation piece
customer_reviews.text: Makes a very unusual leash hook. I haven't tried it, but it doesn't seem sturdy enough to hang a heavy coat on. It did arrive with several black scuffs on it, but it's not worth the postage to return it for another.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa in CT

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced!!
customer_reviews.text: These are cute, I found them at Ikea for 2.99!
customer_reviews.author: SpazRMe

product_meta.title: Ikea Bastis Hook ,Color Green
product_meta.description: Great Quality Hook from Ikea. Fun and Whimsical.
